text: “Ndipo ndithu tikamulawitsa chisomo chochokera kwa Ife atapeza mavuto kwambiri amene adamkhudza, ndithu amanena, (monyada): “Izi nzangazanga. (Ndazipeza chifukwa cha khama langa ndi nzeru zanga). Ndipo za tsiku lachimaliziro sindikhulupirira kuti lilipo. Ndipo ngati nditabwezedwa kwa Mbuye wanga, ndiye kuti ine ndidzakhala nazo zabwino kwa Iye.” Choncho tidzawauza omwe adakanira zimene adachita, ndipo tidzawalawitsa chilango chokhwima (chosanjikana china pamwamba pa chinzake)
